heroBanner.title: Welcome to Datalyz
heroBanner.paragraph: Transforming raw data into actionable insights with cutting-edge tools for collection, analysis, and visualization.

hero.subtitle: Who collects your data online? Find out!

purpose.title: Manage all the data you collect
purpose.subtitle: Who is Datalyz suitable for?

users.title: Users
users.description: Our data management software enables complete automation, from data collection to analysis and visualisation.

associations.title: Associations
associations.description: You can choose whether or not to share which data with whom.

community.title: Community
community.description: Datalyz is open source to advance the field of research.

research.subtitle: We reached here with our hard work and dedication

filterData.description: Our platform provides powerful tools to help you filter, organize, and analyze your data effectively. With intuitive controls and advanced algorithms, you can extract meaningful insights from complex datasets while maintaining full control over your information.

testimonial.quote: Datalyz has completely transformed how we understand our data collection practices. The insights we've gained have been invaluable for our research, and the platform's ease of use made adoption seamless across our entire organization.
testimonial.author: John Doe

coreFeatures.title: Our Core Features
coreFeatures.description: Discover the tools that make Datalyz the ultimate solution for data analysis.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.description: Automate data scraping with our advanced tools to gather user data efficiently.

dataAnalysis.title: Data Analysis
dataAnalysis.description: Explore the inner workings of hyper-personalization algorithms with scientific precision.

dataVisualization.title: Data Visualization
dataVisualization.description: Gain precise insights into behavioral patterns with our intuitive visualization tools.

contentList.content1: At Datalyz, our ultimate goal is to contribute to the scientific community by publishing a research paper on hyper-personalization. We aim to uncover the mechanisms behind algorithmic personalization and provide actionable insights into how these systems influence user behavior.
contentList.content2: By combining advanced data collection, rigorous analysis, and intuitive visualization, we strive to push the boundaries of what's possible in understanding and optimizing hyper-personalized systems.

ctaBanner.title: Ready to Transform Your Data?
ctaBanner.description: Join Datalyz today and unlock the full potential of your data.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description: Meet the team behind Datalyz and their speciality.

process.title: Our 4-Step Process
process.description: A structured approach to transforming data into insights.

steps.title: Data Collection
steps.description: Automate the gathering of user data from multiple sources using our advanced scraping tools.

steps.title: Data Cleaning
steps.description: Ensure data quality by removing inconsistencies and preparing it for analysis.

steps.title: Data Analysis
steps.description: Apply scientific methods to uncover patterns and insights in the data.

steps.title: Visualization & Reporting
steps.description: Present findings through intuitive visualizations and detailed reports.

hero.title: Our Work
hero.subtitle: Developing innovative tools to help researchers understand hyper-personalization algorithms and their impact on user behavior.

goal.title: Our Mission
goal.description: Our project aims to create a comprehensive toolkit for researchers to analyze and understand how hyper-personalization algorithms work. By collecting and analyzing browsing data, we seek to predict and explain what these algorithms understand about users based on their online activity.

understand.title: Understand
understand.description: Decode how algorithms interpret your digital footprint

analyze.title: Analyze
analyze.description: Process browsing data to reveal algorithmic patterns

publish.title: Publish
publish.description: Contribute to scientific research on personalization

hero.title: Get Involved
hero.subtitle: Join our research by contributing your browsing data. Your participation helps us understand how algorithms shape online experiences.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: We offer two methods to collect browsing data depending on your device type.

mobile.title: Mobile Tracking
mobile.description: For mobile devices, we use a VPN solution that captures your browsing activity while ensuring your privacy and security.

features.vpn: Secure VPN connection for data collection

desktop.title: Desktop Tracking
desktop.description: For desktop users, we provide a browser extension that collects your navigation data to analyze what algorithms understand from your browsing habits.

purpose.title: What We Do With Your Data
purpose.description: Your browsing data helps us understand how hyper-personalization algorithms work. We analyze patterns to predict what these algorithms infer about users based on their online behavior.
purpose.privacy: Your privacy is our priority. All data is anonymized and used solely for research purposes. We never sell or share personal information with third parties.

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: A team of passionate students working on cutting-edge research in data science and algorithmic analysis.

project.title: Final Year Project
project.description: Datalyz is a final year project (4th and 5th year) at Epitech. Our goal is to conduct meaningful research on hyper-personalization algorithms and potentially publish a research paper if our findings prove significant.

research.title: Research Objective
research.description: We aim to uncover how hyper-personalization algorithms interpret user behavior. By analyzing browsing patterns, we hope to contribute valuable insights to the scientific community.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: Four dedicated students with complementary skills working together to advance research in algorithmic personalization.

come.description: Specialized in large-scale data processing and analysis

mathieu.description: Expert in data infrastructure and pipeline development

cyprien.description: Focused on machine learning and algorithmic analysis

tom.description: Specialized in process optimization and performance tuning

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have a question or want to work together? We'd love to hear from you!

alert.success: Thank you for your message! We will get back to you soon.

footer.description: We transform your data into actionable insights.
